c: p:re zero kara hajimeru isekai seikatsu
d: Glad the Japanese Raw finally came out, took months compared to Chinese release. Anyways wish this could've been longer but I'll take what little Beatrice (and Petra) focused content we can get. The mesugaki is strong with this one. XD
n: [Doujinshi] [Yousaisha (KINN)] Betty wa Itazura ga Suki 2 | Mischief is Betty's Middle Name! 2 (Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu) [English] {Mistvern} [Digital]
